0110100111110000 1100100100100101 1 -> sum: 0011001100010110, cout: 1

0011100100110010 0000000110110001 0 -> sum: 0011101011100011, cout: 0
1111010110101111 1000001000000110 1 -> sum: 0111011110110110, cout: 1
1000001010110010 0010010001010011 1 -> sum: 1010011100000110, cout: 0
1011101100101000 0100001111001100 0 -> sum: 1111111011110100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
